title: GuapSwap
summary: GuapSwap is a fully decentralized smart contract profit swapping service on the Ergo Blockchain. It provides a decentralized exchange (DEX) platform for swapping digital assets. The project is hosted on GitHub, and a project report is available in the provided PDF file.

qa_pairs.question: What is GuapSwap?
qa_pairs.answer: GuapSwap is a fully decentralized smart contract profit swapping service on the Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key features of GuapSwap?
qa_pairs.answer: GuapSwap is a DEX (decentralized exchange), allows swapping, and is a dApp (decentralized application).

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find the GuapSwap GitHub repository?
qa_pairs.answer: The GuapSwap GitHub repository can be found at https://github.com/GuapSwap.

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find the GuapSwap project report?
qa_pairs.answer: The GuapSwap project report can be found at ../events/pdf/GuapSwap_-_ErgoHack3_Project_Report.pdf.

qa_pairs.question: What blockchain is GuapSwap built on?
qa_pairs.answer: GuapSwap is built on the Ergo Blockchain.

sections.heading: GuapSwap
sections.content:
Guapswap is a fully decentralized smart contract profit swapping service on the Ergo Blockchain.

- [GitHub](https://github.com/GuapSwap)
- [Project Report](../events/pdf/GuapSwap_-_ErgoHack3_Project_Report.pdf)
